full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: V-cone Shaped Heavy Duty Tumble Blender

### Description

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking a V-shape tumbling blender at a value of CAD $<Insert Amount> for delivery to Ottawa, Ontario. The notice has been suspended, *see the Ariba Discovery website for update*

### Key Dates
* Posting Date: 2023-11-08
* Technologies Date: 2023-11-08
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-21 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-27
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

### Eligibility
This tender is available to all qualified vendors, however, it is suggested that firms considering bidding assess their eligibility under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Contract Owner
The purchasing contract is handled by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Requests for Proposal
Those qualified vendors that have the capacity to meet the bid requirements are invited to submit a response with the relevant documentation on the Ariba Discovery website: 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17910076

### Expected Vendors
The bidding firms must deliver the machine to Ottawa, Ontario. All units built according to specifications and approved tests must meet the expected requirements.

### Evaluation Process
A curriculum vitae review by evaluation groups is proposed. The success of the proposal evaluation bases on specific references according to school diplomas included in CVs that will be requested by company from the Headquarters of the biding company, in tuned with our labour Law requirements.

### Sponsored Networks
No Trade Agreements Chapter VII partnership order applicable.
